==Trivia==
* {{Transclude|The Final Feast|HouseOfHearthLeitmotif|section=1}}
* The name of this track references {{It|Conosco il nome dello straniero! Il suo nome è...|I know the name of the stranger! His name is...}}, a line from the finale of ''{{w|Turandot}}'', an opera written by {{w|Giacomo Puccini}}.
